title: Quarkus 3.5.1 released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.5.1, our first maintenance release for the 3.5 release train.  Among other bugfixes, this release fixes the following CVE:   * Build environment information disclosure via Quarkus Gradle plugin  It should be a safe upgrade for anyone already using 3.5.   UPDATE  To update to Quarkus 3.5.1, we recommend updating to the latest version of the Quarkus CLI and run:  quarkus update  To migrate from 3.4, please refer to .  If you are not already using 3.x, please refer to the for all the details. You can also refer to for additional details. Once you upgraded to 3.0, also have a look at the , , , and migration guides.   FULL CHANGELOG  You can get .   COME JOIN US  We value your feedback a lot so please report bugs, ask for improvements… Let’s build something great together!  If you are a Quarkus user or just curious, don’t be shy and join our welcoming community:   * provide feedback on ;   * craft some code and ;   * discuss with us on and on the ;   * ask your questions on .
